content.text:
# Indian Telly Award for Fan Favorite Actor

| year = 2002
| holder = Rohit Purohit for Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
| website = [http://www.indiantellyawards.com Indian Telly Awards]
}}
Indian Telly Award for Fan Favorite Actor is an award given as a part of the annual Indian Telly Awards. The award is voted for by the fans.
Superlatives
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center"
|-
! style="width:350px;"|Superlative
! style="width:600px;"|Actor

| style="width:100px;"|3
|-
|Actor with most nominations
| style="width:500px;"|Ronit Roy
| style="width:100px;"|8
|-
|Actor with most nominations without winning
| style="width:500px;"|Varun Badola
| style="width:100px;"|5
|}
